author: remm
msg: - Add back the tests with OPTIONS.

author: remm
msg: - The output will only be closed when necessary (instead of just whenever the
client wasn't in HTTP/1.1 mode). This fixes problems with some HTTP servers.
- Also, openConnection will no longer retry after getting an IOException when
trying to open the connection; it will now rethow the IOException after resetting
the socket. This also fixes a bug where the SSL socket would be reopened in

author: remm
msg: - OPTIONS doesn't need setting content length.

author: rwaldhoff
msg: * Adding support for HTTPS to HttpClient
* Mods to build.xml, build.properties.sample, and STATUS.html to reflect dependency on JSSE
* Adding README.txt with deployment and build instructions
